name: Drifter (itch) (Storm Howard)
description:
Racing, Boosting & Drifting
Speed around the track, beat your personal best and master the art of racing

Controls

Mouse can be used for menu navigation

Keyboard Gamepad (Xbox) Function A / D Left & Right D-pad / Left Joystick Turn Left/Right W / S Right Trigger & Left Trigger Speed Up/Down Space Right Bumper Drift Shift A / B Boost Escape Start Pause WASD / Arrows D-pad Menu Navigation Space / Enter A Menu Interaction Escape B Back a menu Features
  • Keyboard, Mouse and Controller Support!
  • No loading screens!
  • Dynamic controller / keyboard input for both in game and menu navigation
  • Simple menu navigation
Planned Features
  • Split Screen
  • More maps
  • Graphical improvements
  • Handling improvements
  • More Sounds and Music
  • More Game-modes
  • Optimization
  • General bug fixes

Really ran low on time towards the end so please ignore the rushed map, obvious bugs and other issues, they will be fixed with time.

Important Known bugs:
  • Pressing the play button too early can close the game sometimes.
  • Skipping through levels too quickly can close the game sometimes.
  • The game runs somewhat slowly when maximised in window mode, to fix this just go fullscreen or resize the window to be smaller.

Note: Many features are not yet complete and development on the game is still active, with two major updates planned to massively improve the game.

This game was submitted for the Movement Jam, so the game is not yet finished.
